location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Summaries of official secret despatches from the Government of India and the Government of Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: The papers have been arranged into bundles tied with silk ribbons; each bundle summarises correspondence received on a given date. These bundles have been arranged in chronological order.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the first folio with 1, and terminates at the last folio with 116; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file consists of summaries of official secret despatches from India and Persia relating to affairs in the Persian Gulf, Turkey, Sind, Tibet, Burma, Afghanistan, Bahawalpur, Kashmir, Pegu, Punjab, and Kabul, and to the Slave Trade.The date range gives the creation date of the summaries, but the summaries themselves refer to correspondence of an earlier date.
